name: Shanghai  Henglight Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd.
overview:
Shanghai Henglihgt Electronic Technology Co., Ltd founded in 2005, specialising in designing and manufacture, managing new LED lighting fixture, and we get great breakthrough on led grow light. We have exported our LED lights to many countries all over the world.

Our LED grow lights are widely used in horticulture and agriculture. By the illumination of suitable LED grow lights, Plants will get the dual benefits of high-speed growth and longer flowering, such as Spathiphyllum, Phalaenopsis and so on. It is therefore possible for growers to enhance product quality and take advantage of marketing opportunities throughout the year.

We can have a cooperation in the world market,hoping we can have a nice and long-term cooperation.

We look forward to getting good news from u.

Sincerely yours
